member_organisations: The Arvalis board comprises 36 farmers  representatives  of professional bodies, cooperatives, development, other applied research institutes, ...
eu_initiatives: Arvalis is interested on EU activities on crop protection, fertilisation, soils, environment, quality and common agricultural policy
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: Arvalis is an applied research institute dedicated to arable crops. It helps farmers and advisors in agriculture sector to improve practices taking into account competiveness market requirements and environmental protection.
relevant_communication:
A lot of research projects 
Main events : Les culturales, Potato Europ, EAPR, Phloème... 
Main publications : Perspectives agricoles, Yvoir, Arvalis-Terres inovia infos... 
Website : arvalis-info.fr
